E819C07E4D525CACB4BC0BA3E1EFBE1B: Lets players run a custom Verse script
0156B90F4D5E75298F886FA5AFC000E7: Loads and runs a specified Verse script.

UserOptionDefinition.VerseDevice_C.VisibleInGame.Description: Determines whether the script device is visible during games.
UserOptionDefinition.VerseDevice_C.Enabled at Game Start.Desc: Whether or not the attached script will run during the game.
